body_html:
Hi , I am trying to print log statements in 'DirectSession::Run' from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/direct_session.cc#L364

as described in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24325463/how-to-get-console-output-of-log-lines-printf-cout-etc-of-c-library-use

and then built the libraries from source file.

I have then used the library in android ndk , but the logs are not getting printed in android studio.
Please help in debugging the .so file code from Android Studio using ndk

body:
Hi , I am trying to print log statements in 'DirectSession::Run' from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/direct_session.cc#L364 

as described in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24325463/how-to-get-console-output-of-log-lines-printf-cout-etc-of-c-library-use

and then built the libraries from source file.

I have then used the library in android ndk , but the logs are not getting printed in android studio.
Please help in debugging the .so file code from Android Studio using ndk
